lore: Giants have a tough, violent and utterly disrespectful personality, as well as a mean face, all in the image and likeness of their one true God.\n\nThanks to the composition of its body, the Sand Giant can regenerate any of its limbs in a matter of seconds as long as it is still alive. When Vulcanar saw this huge and "!@#$ING MAJESTIC" creature, he decided to ignore the advice of the Goddess of Illusion and create something that stood out even more in order to irritate the God of Anger.
menagerieDialog: Humans are weak! Even baby Giants can crush your kind with one hand.
I'll send your enemies flying with a kick to the gut. Bring it on!
If you ever need any help re-arranging your castle, I'm your Giant! Just say the word.
(It's curling two of your other creatures as they all giggle maniacally. It would probably be best for you to leave them to it.)
(It's playing some make-shift drums using its stool and two excessively large tree trunks.)
name: Sand Giant
